description.value:
Trigger Lady Embersplitter announces that the victim has died

Effect The crowd begins moving around the bailey and deals @Damage[(4d6)[bludgeoning]] damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true] save), and then rolls initiative.

details.description: The crowd rushes forward, risking a stampede as everyone tries to fnd a safe exit.
details.disable: @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:18] to calm the crowd, or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:21] or @Check[type:society|dc:21] to control the crowd's behavior

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-01: Intro to the Year of Immortal Influence

details.routine:
(1 action) On its initiative, the crowd moves 5 feet toward the exit in area A1, then crushes any creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], dealing @Damage[(4d6)[bludgeoning]] damage. All targets must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true] save.

Failure The target takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, becomes prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.
